name: Flaming Red Bolognese
effect: Restores 18-22% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 300-470 HP every 5s for the next 30s.
description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The meaty, herby aroma really gets your appetite going.
source: Purchase (Sara at The Good Hunter in Monstadt, Monstadt, AR20+)
